pages.text: These essences dropped by that $(l:world/bestiary/wight)horrific creature$() appears to be resonating towards something. By combining it with an Eye of Ender, you've discovered that instead of leading to the nearest Stronghold, it leads to $(l:world/crypts)someplace else$().
It appears that using it will throw a copy of the eye instead of using it fully. However, it takes up durability when doing so.
